div: Photoluminescence spectra of 3a–c recorded in CH 2Cl 2 at room temperature (black trace, dashed line), PMMA film at room temperature (blue trace, solid line), and in 1 : 3 CH 2Cl 2/toluene glass at 77 K (red trace, dotted line). Samples were excited at λ = 310 nm. The insets show photographs of the PMMA films under UV illumination.
